title: Miracle Winter - December 30 - Primary Weapons/Secondary Equipment
content: This Saturday, December 30, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Primary Weapons and Secondary Equipment!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Minor Patch - December 21, 2023
content: The minor patch has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 7 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client!

title: Cash Shop Update for December 20
content: Winter Surprise Style Box, Christmas Royal Styles, Permanent Winter Effects, and more!

title: Join the Abyssal Expedition!
content: Abyss, a huge crack and unknown territory, has been found throughout Maple World! Become the best expedition captain that will lead your team to victory!

title: v.247 Hotfixes - December 18, 2023
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.247 New Age: Into The Abyss update.
